text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump It’s so hypocritical trump who cost hundreds of lives by his COVID19 lies is attending a virtual Christian mass. You do realize he’s conning his way by blaming everyone else for this mess. We are not fooled. #TrumpKNEWandDidNOTHING https://t.co/z6WRDphUJ4
